name: SpaceNinja
description:
Welcome! SpaceNinja is a side project of mine I've been working on in college. Inspired by Megaman, Cuphead, Undertale, Kirby, and many more, SpaceNinja is a run-and-gun boss rush game. While you can only shoot and dash to the right, you can move in any direction and double-jump. Defeating each boss gives a suit augmentation that you can choose before each boss fight. All the music in the game is composed by myself using 8 bit sounds and soundfonts from a few games. The art isn't great, but I promise the music and hopefully the gameplay make up for it! The game is entirely written in java, and I started it when I was pretty new to game dev, so it may not be optimized perfectly and sometimes chugs when it first opens, but give it a few seconds and it will run! Also, if you would like to donate towards my steam application fund, anything is appreciated! Feedback is also greatly appreciated.

Warning: this game gets pretty hard. just keep at it!
